a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The share of nuclear and renewables in total electricity
'Renewables' includes hydropower, biomass, wind, solar, geothermal, and marine production. It does not include traditional
Data source: Ember's Yearly Electricity Data; Ember's European Electricity Review; Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy
